Resources & Further Learning

Official Documentation

Resource Description
REST API Documentation Complete REST API reference
GraphQL API Documentation GraphQL schema and guides
Webhooks Documentation Webhook configuration and events
GitHub Apps Guide Building and managing GitHub Apps
GraphQL Explorer Interactive GraphQL IDE

Tools

Tool Purpose
GitHub CLI (gh) Command-line API access
Octokit Official API client libraries
Probot Framework for building GitHub Apps
Smee.io Webhook debugging and forwarding

Sample Projects

  • Probot Settings App - Repository settings as code
  • Delete Merged Branch - Auto-delete branches
  • Auto-assign - Auto-assign PR reviewers
